Why not "bolshoy?"  I was of the impression й is traditionally transliterated as ''y'', as per pronounciation.  --

This article is about a theatre so I don't think a general ballet project navigation box is appropriate here. What do other people think? P.S. I would not be in favour of a general opera box or a general Russia box either. --''
